text:
Hi everyone,
Hope you are all having a wonderful day.  I'm a developer working to build an integration layer between HubSpot crm and my company's platform, which is used to visualize data and goals.  Just wanted to introduce myself before I prowl around this slack looking for answers and help.  Thank you!

If anyone has any insight to my issue: We have an integration with another cms in which a user creates a "report" and the API can directly consume that object, mapping the aggregated report metrics into our platform.  Is there any way to do this with the HubSpot CRM API?  I looked into the Analytics API documentation but it does not seem to offer the capabilities I'm looking for.
